Unit Tests

Unit Tests

20 Apr 2014

Got this article from Ruby Weekly.

I parse large datasets on a fairly slow computer emulating Linux via Cygwin. This not an ideal engineering environment but it is acceptible to current employer and actually a pretty nice way to integrate with a Windows workplace.

Anyway, I know tests are good for me, but have not written any for my projects. This article may change that. Singleton method to small example datasets.
